TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionList extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供型別的基底類別，該型別定義用於建立智慧標籤面板的項目清單。

span.span: Provides the base class for types that define a list of items used to create a smart tag panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DesignerAction`功能可讓元件和控制項來顯示內容相關資訊和命令。The `DesignerAction` feature enables components and controls to display context-sensitive information and commands. `DesignerAction`功能可以視為設計工具動詞命令，來取代因為可以在智慧標籤面板及相關聯的元件或控制項的捷徑功能表中顯示。The `DesignerAction` feature can be thought of as a replacement for designer verbs, because a can be displayed in the smart tag panel and also in the shortcut menu associated with a component or control. 類別代表主要的互動點，開發人員想要加入智慧標籤支援以其自訂的元件和控制項。The class represents the main point of interaction for developers who want to add smart tag support to their custom components and controls. 是基底類別，衍生自元件開發人員以填入智慧標籤面板。 is the base class, derived from by component developers in order to populate a smart tag panel. 智慧標籤面板代表智慧標籤功能表類似使用者介面 (UI)。A smart tag panel represents the menu-like user interface (UI) for smart tags. 這個衍生的類別可實作`virtual`方法，以傳回物件的集合，衍生自。This derived class may implement the `virtual` method to return a collection of objects derived from . 這些物件代表的智慧標籤面板項目。These objects represent the smart tag panel items. 每個項目會顯示在窗格中，根據其型別。Each item is displayed in the panel according to its type. 比方說，會顯示為靜態文字標籤。For example, a is displayed as a static text label. 作用中的控制台項目，表示和型別，有相對應的可公開存取屬性或方法，分別實作該項功能。Active panel items, represented by the and types, have a corresponding publicly accessible property or method, respectively, that implements the functionality for that item. 如需如何將項目新增至智慧標籤面板的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information about how to add items to the smart tag panel, see the method. > [!NOTE] > 由衍生自類別的成員，則可以顯示表單和對話方塊。Forms and dialog boxes can be displayed by members of the class derived from . 根據預設，這些視窗的父代會智慧標籤面板的 [容器] 視窗。By default, the parent of these windows will be the container window for the smart tag panel. 明確的父代到另一個服務或視窗這些子視窗可能會導致無法正確地顯示智慧標籤。Explicitly parenting these child windows to another service or window may cause smart tags to display improperly. > > 智慧標籤面板不支援捲動或分頁，所以要小心，不要填入您的面板，與許多智慧標籤項目。Smart-tag panels do not support scrolling or paging, so be careful not to populate your panels with many smart-tag items. 太多的項目可能會導致導致超過螢幕的界限的智慧標籤面板。Too many items may result in the smart-tag panel extending beyond the screen boundary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 如需這個程式碼範例的完整說明，請參閱 < [ 如何： 附加至 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式屬性設`false`。The constructor sets the property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 如需這個程式碼範例的完整說明，請參閱 < [ 如何： 附加至 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出智慧標籤面板是否應當在建立時自動顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the smart tag panel should automatically be displayed when it is created.

value.span: 如果在建立主控元件時應當顯示該面板，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the panel should be shown when the owning component is created; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性值設定為`true`，這個元件會自動關聯的會展開並顯示智慧標籤面板中，建立元件時。If the property value is set to `true`, the component with which this is associated will automatically expand and display the smart tag panel when the component is created. 您可以藉由設定退出此行為屬性設`false`。You can opt out of this behavior by setting the property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 如需這個程式碼範例的完整說明，請參閱 < [ 如何： 附加至 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItemCollection GetSortedActionItems() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetSortedActionItems () As DesignerActionItemCollection

summary.span: 傳回包含於清單中的 物件集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of objects contained in the list.

returns.span: 陣列，包含這個清單中的項目。

span.span: A array that contains the items in this list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `virtual` 方法的實作傳回，請在預期的顯示順序、 物件的集合，衍生自類別。The `virtual` method is implemented to return, in the expected display order, a collection of objects derived from the class. 這些項目可以是下列特定的類型。These items can be of the following specific types. |型別Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||以粗體顯示的群組標籤。The group label, displayed in bold.| ||純文字的字型顯示標籤。A label, displayed in a plain font.| ||面板項目相關聯的屬性。A panel item associated with a property. 可能也會顯示核取記號或基礎屬性相關聯的屬性編輯器。May also display a check mark or property editor associated with the underlying property.| ||控制台項目顯示為超連結，而與方法相關聯。A panel item displayed as a hyperlink and associated with a method.| 針對每個並，對應的方法或屬性必須新增至程式設計人員提供的類別衍生自類別。For every and , a corresponding method or property must be added to the programmer-supplied class derived from the class. 每個方法和屬性的項目會顯示為作用中的項目;與它互動透過使用者介面 (UI) 會叫用對應的方法或屬性，分別。Each method and property item is displayed as an active entry; interacting with it through the user interface (UI) invokes the corresponding method or property, respectively. 屬性項目有一個特殊的控制台項目介面，讓顯示和操作其對應的屬性值。Property items have a special panel-item interface that enables display and manipulation of their corresponding property values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 傳回陣列中項目的順序會反映會出現在 [面板] 中的順序。The order of the items in the returned array reflects the order that they will appear in the panel. 根據分組項目屬性，使用下列規則：The items are grouped according to the property, using the following rules: - 遇到第一個項目分類表示第一個群組開始。The category of the first item encountered signifies the start of the first group. 只要每個後續項目屬於相同的類別目錄，則會繼續該群組。That group continues as long as each succeeding item is of the same category. 當遇到的不同，則新的類別目錄項目時，會建立一個新的群組和項目會置於。When an item of a different, new category is encountered, a new group is created and the item is placed in it. - 如果項目具有型別不同於目前的群組，但該類別已在使用中，項目會在相符的現有類別中。If an item has a type different than the current group, but that category has already been used, the item is placed in the matching existing category. - 如果項目沒有一個類別，會將它放在結尾的 [面板] 中的其他群組。If an item does not have a category, it is placed in a miscellaneous group at the end of the panel. 這個群組也包含項目其屬性設定為`false`。This group also contains items whose property is set to `false`. 面板最初建立時，呼叫方法。The method is called when the panel is first created. 您必須呼叫方法，以更新面板中顯示的項目清單。You must call the method to update the list of items displayed in the panel. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 如需這個程式碼範例的完整說明，請參閱 < [ 如何： 附加至 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]
